question: In the given sequence of reactions, identify 'P, 'Q', 'R' and 'S' respectively.
images/2024-chem-34-1.png
[cite: 268-269]
choices: HBr, Alc. KOH, <katex>$NaNH_{2}$</katex> Red hot iron tube
<katex>$Br_{2}$</katex> Alc. KOH, <katex>$NaNH_{2}$</katex> Red hot iron tube
explanation: Sequence: Ethene -> Vicinal dibromide (P=<katex>$Br_2$</katex>) -> Vinyl bromide (Q=Alc KOH) -> Ethyne (R=<katex>$NaNH_2$</katex>) -> Benzene (S=Red hot iron tube). [cite: 272, 277]
